text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: hate citrAGgade bhISmo bAle bhrAtari cAnagha
text.ud: हते चित्राङ्गदे भीष्मो बाले भ्रातरि चानघ
text.ur: hate citrāṅgade bhīṣmo bāle bhrātari cānagha

text.ascii: pAlayAm Asa tad rAjyaM satyavatyA mate sthitaH
text.ur: pālayām āsa tad rājyaṁ satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ

text.ascii: saMprAptayauvanaM pazyan bhrAtaraM dhImatAM varam
text.ur: saṁprāptayauvanaṁ paśyan bhrātaraṁ dhīmatāṁ varam

text.ascii: bhISmo vicitravIryasya vivAhAyAkaron matim
text.ur: bhīṣmo vicitravīryasya vivāhāyākaron matim

text.ascii: atha kAzipater bhISmaH kanyAs tisro 'psaraHsamAH
text.ur: atha kāśipater bhīṣmaḥ kanyās tisro ’psaraḥsamāḥ

text.ascii: zuzrAva sahitA rAjan vRNvatIr vai svayaM varam
text.ur: śuśrāva sahitā rājan vr̥ṇvatīr vai svayaṁ varam

text.ascii: tataH sa rathinAM zreSTho rathenaikena varmabhRt
text.ud: ततः स रथिनां श्रेष्ठो रथेनैकेन वर्मभृत्
text.ur: tataḥ sa rathināṁ śreṣṭho rathenaikena varmabhr̥t

text.ascii: jagAmAnumate mAtuH purIM vArANasIM prati
text.ur: jagāmānumate mātuḥ purīṁ vārāṇasīṁ prati

text.ascii: tatra rAjJaH samuditAn sarvataH samupAgatAn
text.ur: tatra rājñaḥ samuditān sarvataḥ samupāgatān

text.ascii: dadarza kanyAs tAz caiva bhISmaH zaMtanunandanaH
text.ur: dadarśa kanyās tāś caiva bhīṣmaḥ śaṁtanunandanaḥ

text.ascii: kIrtyamAneSu rAjJAM tu nAmasv atha sahasrazaH
text.ur: kīrtyamāneṣu rājñāṁ tu nāmasv atha sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: bhISmaH svayaM tadA rAjan varayAm Asa tAH prabhuH
text.ud: भीष्मः स्वयं तदा राजन्वरयामास ताः प्रभुः
text.ur: bhīṣmaḥ svayaṁ tadā rājan varayām āsa tāḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: uvAca ca mahIpAlAn rAjaJ jaladaniHsvanaH
text.ur: uvāca ca mahīpālān rājañ jaladaniḥsvanaḥ

text.ascii: ratham Aropya tAH kanyA bhISmaH praharatAM varaH
text.ud: रथमारोप्य ताः कन्या भीष्मः प्रहरतां वरः
text.ur: ratham āropya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: AhUya dAnaM kanyAnAM guNavadbhyaH smRtaM budhaiH
text.ud: आहूय दानं कन्यानां गुणवद्भ्यः स्मृतं बुधैः
text.ur: āhūya dānaṁ kanyānāṁ guṇavadbhyaḥ smr̥taṁ budhaiḥ

text.ascii: alaMkRtya yathAzakti pradAya ca dhanAny api
text.ur: alaṁkr̥tya yathāśakti pradāya ca dhanāny api

text.ascii: prayacchanty apare kanyAM mithunena gavAm api
text.ur: prayacchanty apare kanyāṁ mithunena gavām api

text.ascii: vittena kathitenAnye balenAnye 'numAnya ca
text.ur: vittena kathitenānye balenānye ’numānya ca

text.ascii: pramattAm upayAnty anye svayam anye ca vindate
text.ur: pramattām upayānty anye svayam anye ca vindate

text.ascii: aSTamaM tam atho vitta vivAhaM kavibhiH smRtam
text.ud: अष्टमं तमथो वित्त विवाहं कविभिः स्मृतम्
text.ur: aṣṭamaṁ tam atho vitta vivāhaṁ kavibhiḥ smr̥tam

text.ascii: svayaMvaraM tu rAjanyAH prazaMsanty upayAnti ca
text.ur: svayaṁvaraṁ tu rājanyāḥ praśaṁsanty upayānti ca

text.ascii: pramathya tu hRtAm Ahur jyAyasIM dharmavAdinaH
text.ur: pramathya tu hr̥tām āhur jyāyasīṁ dharmavādinaḥ

text.ascii: tA imAH pRthivIpAlA jihIrSAmi balAd itaH
text.ur: tā imāḥ pr̥thivīpālā jihīrṣāmi balād itaḥ

text.ascii: te yatadhvaM paraM zaktyA vijayAyetarAya vA
text.ud: ते यतध्वं परं शक्त्या विजयायेतराय वा
text.ur: te yatadhvaṁ paraṁ śaktyā vijayāyetarāya vā

text.ascii: sthito 'haM pRthivIpAlA yuddhAya kRtanizcayaH
text.ur: sthito ’haṁ pr̥thivīpālā yuddhāya kr̥taniścayaḥ

text.ascii: evam uktvA mahIpAlAn kAzirAjaM ca vIryavAn
text.ur: evam uktvā mahīpālān kāśirājaṁ ca vīryavān

text.ascii: sarvAH kanyAH sa kauravyo ratham Aropayat svakam
text.ur: sarvāḥ kanyāḥ sa kauravyo ratham āropayat svakam

text.ascii: Amantrya ca sa tAn prAyAc chIghraM kanyAH pragRhya tAH
text.ud: आमन्त्र्य च स तान्प्रायाच्छीघ्रं कन्याः प्रगृह्य ताः
text.ur: āmantrya ca sa tān prāyāc chīghraṁ kanyāḥ pragr̥hya tāḥ

text.ascii: tatas te pArthivAH sarve samutpetur amarSitAH
text.ur: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve samutpetur amarṣitāḥ

text.ascii: saMspRzantaH svakAn bAhUn dazanto dazanacchadAn
text.ur: saṁspr̥śantaḥ svakān bāhūn daśanto daśanacchadān

text.ascii: teSAm AbharaNAny Azu tvaritAnAM vimuJcatAm
text.ur: teṣām ābharaṇāny āśu tvaritānāṁ vimuñcatām

text.ascii: AmuJcatAM ca varmANi saMbhramaH sumahAn abhUt
text.ur: āmuñcatāṁ ca varmāṇi saṁbhramaḥ sumahān abhūt

text.ascii: tArANAm iva saMpAto babhUva janamejaya
text.ur: tārāṇām iva saṁpāto babhūva janamejaya

text.ascii: bhUSaNAnAM ca zubhrANAM kavacAnAM ca sarvazaH
text.ud: भूषणानां च शुभ्राणां कवचानां च सर्वशः
text.ur: bhūṣaṇānāṁ ca śubhrāṇāṁ kavacānāṁ ca sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: savarmabhir bhUSaNais te drAg bhrAjadbhir itas tataH
text.ur: savarmabhir bhūṣaṇais te drāg bhrājadbhir itas tataḥ

text.ascii: sakrodhAmarSajihmabhrUsakaSAyadRzas tathA
text.ur: sakrodhāmarṣajihmabhrūsakaṣāyadr̥śas tathā

text.ascii: sUtopakLptAn rucirAn sadazvodyatadhUrgatAn
text.ur: sūtopakl̥ptān rucirān sadaśvodyatadhūrgatān

text.ascii: rathAn AsthAya te vIrAH sarvapraharaNAnvitAH
text.ur: rathān āsthāya te vīrāḥ sarvapraharaṇānvitāḥ

text.ascii: prayAntam ekaM kauravyam anusasrur udAyudhAH
text.ur: prayāntam ekaṁ kauravyam anusasrur udāyudhāḥ

text.ascii: tataH samabhavad yuddhaM teSAM tasya ca bhArata
text.ud: ततः समभवद्युद्धं तेषां तस्य च भारत
text.ur: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṁ teṣāṁ tasya ca bhārata

text.ascii: ekasya ca bahUnAM ca tumulaM lomaharSaNam
text.ud: एकस्य च बहूनां च तुमुलं लोमहर्षणम्
text.ur: ekasya ca bahūnāṁ ca tumulaṁ lomaharṣaṇam

text.ascii: te tv iSUn dazasAhasrAMs tasmai yugapad AkSipan
text.ur: te tv iṣūn daśasāhasrāṁs tasmai yugapad ākṣipan

text.ascii: aprAptAMz caiva tAn Azu bhISmaH sarvAMs tadAcchinat
text.ur: aprāptāṁś caiva tān āśu bhīṣmaḥ sarvāṁs tadācchinat

text.ascii: tatas te pArthivAH sarve sarvataH parivArayan
text.ur: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve sarvataḥ parivārayan

text.ascii: vavarSuH zaravarSeNa varSeNevAdrim ambudAH
text.ur: vavarṣuḥ śaravarṣeṇa varṣeṇevādrim ambudāḥ

text.ascii: sa tad bANamayaM varSaM zarair AvArya sarvataH
text.ur: sa tad bāṇamayaṁ varṣaṁ śarair āvārya sarvataḥ

text.ascii: tataH sarvAn mahIpAlAn pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiH
text.ur: tataḥ sarvān mahīpālān pratyavidhyat tribhis tribhiḥ

text.ascii: tasyAti puruSAn anyA&l lAghavaM rathacAriNaH
text.ur: tasyāti puruṣān anyām̐l lāghavaṁ rathacāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: rakSaNaM cAtmanaH saMkhye zatravo 'py abhyapUjayan
text.ur: rakṣaṇaṁ cātmanaḥ saṁkhye śatravo ’py abhyapūjayan

text.ascii: tAn vinirjitya tu raNe sarvazastravizAradaH
text.ur: tān vinirjitya tu raṇe sarvaśastraviśāradaḥ

text.ascii: kanyAbhiH sahitaH prAyAd bhArato bhAratAn prati
text.ur: kanyābhiḥ sahitaḥ prāyād bhārato bhāratān prati

text.ascii: tatas taM pRSThato rAjaJ zAlvarAjo mahArathaH
text.ur: tatas taṁ pr̥ṣṭhato rājañ śālvarājo mahārathaḥ

text.ascii: abhyAhanad ameyAtmA bhISmaM zAMtanavaM raNe
text.ur: abhyāhanad ameyātmā bhīṣmaṁ śāṁtanavaṁ raṇe

text.ascii: vAraNaM jaghane nighnan dantAbhyAm aparo yathA
text.ur: vāraṇaṁ jaghane nighnan dantābhyām aparo yathā

text.ascii: vAzitAm anusaMprApto yUthapo balinAM varaH
text.ur: vāśitām anusaṁprāpto yūthapo balināṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: strIkAma tiSTha tiSTheti bhISmam Aha sa pArthivaH
text.ud: स्त्रीकाम तिष्ठ तिष्ठेति भीष्ममाह स पार्थिवः
text.ur: strīkāma tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti bhīṣmam āha sa pārthivaḥ

text.ascii: zAlvarAjo mahAbAhur amarSeNAbhicoditaH
text.ur: śālvarājo mahābāhur amarṣeṇābhicoditaḥ

text.ascii: tataH sa puruSavyAghro bhISmaH parabalArdanaH
text.ur: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghro bhīṣmaḥ parabalārdanaḥ

text.ascii: tadvAkyAkulitaH krodhAd vidhUmo 'gnir iva jvalan
text.ur: tadvākyākulitaḥ krodhād vidhūmo ’gnir iva jvalan

text.ascii: kSatradharmaM samAsthAya vyapetabhayasaMbhramaH
text.ur: kṣatradharmaṁ samāsthāya vyapetabhayasaṁbhramaḥ

text.ascii: nivartayAm Asa rathaM zAlvaM prati mahArathaH
text.ur: nivartayām āsa rathaṁ śālvaṁ prati mahārathaḥ

text.ascii: nivartamAnaM taM dRSTvA rAjAnaH sarva eva te
text.ud: निवर्तमानं तं दृष्ट्वा राजानः सर्व एव ते
text.ur: nivartamānaṁ taṁ dr̥ṣṭvā rājānaḥ sarva eva te

text.ascii: prekSakAH samapadyanta bhISmazAlvasamAgame
text.ur: prekṣakāḥ samapadyanta bhīṣmaśālvasamāgame

text.ascii: tau vRSAv iva nardantau balinau vAzitAntare
text.ur: tau vr̥ṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare

text.ascii: anyonyam abhivartetAM balavikramazAlinau
text.ur: anyonyam abhivartetāṁ balavikramaśālinau

text.ascii: tato bhISmaM zAMtanavaM zaraiH zatasahasrazaH
text.ur: tato bhīṣmaṁ śāṁtanavaṁ śaraiḥ śatasahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: zAlvarAjo narazreSThaH samavAkirad AzugaiH
text.ur: śālvarājo naraśreṣṭhaḥ samavākirad āśugaiḥ

text.ascii: pUrvam abhyarditaM dRSTvA bhISmaM zAlvena te nRpAH
text.ud: पूर्वमभ्यर्दितं दृष्ट्वा भीष्मं शाल्वेन ते नृपाः
text.ur: pūrvam abhyarditaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā bhīṣmaṁ śālvena te nr̥pāḥ

text.ascii: vismitAH samapadyanta sAdhu sAdhv iti cAbruvan
text.ur: vismitāḥ samapadyanta sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan

text.ascii: lAghavaM tasya te dRSTvA saMyuge sarvapArthivAH
text.ud: लाघवं तस्य ते दृष्ट्वा संयुगे सर्वपार्थिवाः
text.ur: lāghavaṁ tasya te dr̥ṣṭvā saṁyuge sarvapārthivāḥ

text.ascii: apUjayanta saMhRSTA vAgbhiH zAlvaM narAdhipAH
text.ur: apūjayanta saṁhr̥ṣṭā vāgbhiḥ śālvaṁ narādhipāḥ

text.ascii: kSatriyANAM tadA vAcaH zrutvA parapuraMjayaH
text.ur: kṣatriyāṇāṁ tadā vācaḥ śrutvā parapuraṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: kruddhaH zAMtanavo bhISmas tiSTha tiSThety abhASata
text.ur: kruddhaḥ śāṁtanavo bhīṣmas tiṣṭha tiṣṭhety abhāṣata

text.ascii: sArathiM cAbravIt kruddho yAhi yatraiSa pArthivaH
text.ur: sārathiṁ cābravīt kruddho yāhi yatraiṣa pārthivaḥ

text.ascii: yAvad enaM nihanmy adya bhujaMgam iva pakSirAT
text.ur: yāvad enaṁ nihanmy adya bhujaṁgam iva pakṣirāṭ

text.ascii: tato 'straM vAruNaM samyag yojayAm Asa kauravaH
text.ur: tato ’straṁ vāruṇaṁ samyag yojayām āsa kauravaḥ

text.ascii: tenAzvAMz caturo 'mRdnAc chAlvarAjJo narAdhipa
text.ur: tenāśvāṁś caturo ’mr̥dnāc chālvarājño narādhipa

text.ascii: astrair astrANi saMvArya zAlvarAjJaH sa kauravaH
text.ur: astrair astrāṇi saṁvārya śālvarājñaḥ sa kauravaḥ

text.ascii: bhISmo nRpatizArdUla nyavadhIt tasya sArathim
text.ur: bhīṣmo nr̥patiśārdūla nyavadhīt tasya sārathim

text.ascii: astreNa cApy athaikena nyavadhIt turagottamAn
text.ur: astreṇa cāpy athaikena nyavadhīt turagottamān

text.ascii: kanyAhetor narazreSTha bhISmaH zAMtanavas tadA
text.ur: kanyāhetor naraśreṣṭha bhīṣmaḥ śāṁtanavas tadā

text.ascii: jitvA visarjayAm Asa jIvantaM nRpasattamam
text.ur: jitvā visarjayām āsa jīvantaṁ nr̥pasattamam

text.ascii: tataH zAlvaH svanagaraM prayayau bharatarSabha
text.ur: tataḥ śālvaḥ svanagaraṁ prayayau bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: rAjAno ye ca tatrAsan svayaMvaradidRkSavaH
text.ur: rājāno ye ca tatrāsan svayaṁvaradidr̥kṣavaḥ

text.ascii: svAny eva te 'pi rASTrANi jagmuH parapuraMjaya
text.ur: svāny eva te ’pi rāṣṭrāṇi jagmuḥ parapuraṁjaya

text.ascii: evaM vijitya tAH kanyA bhISmaH praharatAM varaH
text.ud: एवं विजित्य ताः कन्या भीष्मः प्रहरतां वरः
text.ur: evaṁ vijitya tāḥ kanyā bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: prayayau hAstinapuraM yatra rAjA sa kauravaH
text.ud: प्रययौ हास्तिनपुरं यत्र राजा स कौरवः
text.ur: prayayau hāstinapuraṁ yatra rājā sa kauravaḥ

text.ascii: so 'cireNaiva kAlena atyakrAman narAdhipa
text.ur: so ’cireṇaiva kālena atyakrāman narādhipa

text.ascii: vanAni saritaz caiva zailAMz ca vividhadrumAn
text.ur: vanāni saritaś caiva śailāṁś ca vividhadrumān

text.ascii: akSataH kSapayitvArIn saMkhye 'saMkhyeyavikramaH
text.ur: akṣataḥ kṣapayitvārīn saṁkhye ’saṁkhyeyavikramaḥ

text.ascii: AnayAm Asa kAzyasya sutAH sAgaragAsutaH
text.ur: ānayām āsa kāśyasya sutāḥ sāgaragāsutaḥ

text.ascii: snuSA iva sa dharmAtmA bhaginya iva cAnujAH
text.ud: स्नुषा इव स धर्मात्मा भगिन्य इव चानुजाः
text.ur: snuṣā iva sa dharmātmā bhaginya iva cānujāḥ

text.ascii: yathA duhitaraz caiva pratigRhya yayau kurUn
text.ur: yathā duhitaraś caiva pratigr̥hya yayau kurūn

text.ascii: tAH sarvA guNasaMpannA bhrAtA bhrAtre yavIyase
text.ud: ताः सर्वा गुणसंपन्ना भ्राता भ्रात्रे यवीयसे
text.ur: tāḥ sarvā guṇasaṁpannā bhrātā bhrātre yavīyase

text.ascii: bhISmo vicitravIryAya pradadau vikramAhRtAH
text.ur: bhīṣmo vicitravīryāya pradadau vikramāhr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: satAM dharmeNa dharmajJaH kRtvA karmAtimAnuSam
text.ur: satāṁ dharmeṇa dharmajñaḥ kr̥tvā karmātimānuṣam

text.ascii: bhrAtur vicitravIryasya vivAhAyopacakrame
text.ur: bhrātur vicitravīryasya vivāhāyopacakrame

text.ascii: satyavatyA saha mithaH kRtvA nizcayam AtmavAn
text.ur: satyavatyā saha mithaḥ kr̥tvā niścayam ātmavān

text.ascii: vivAhaM kArayiSyantaM bhISmaM kAzipateH sutA
text.ur: vivāhaṁ kārayiṣyantaṁ bhīṣmaṁ kāśipateḥ sutā

text.ascii: jyeSThA tAsAm idaM vAkyam abravId dha satI tadA
text.ur: jyeṣṭhā tāsām idaṁ vākyam abravīd dha satī tadā

text.ascii: mayA saubhapatiH pUrvaM manasAbhivRtaH patiH
text.ur: mayā saubhapatiḥ pūrvaṁ manasābhivr̥taḥ patiḥ

text.ascii: tena cAsmi vRtA pUrvam eSa kAmaz ca me pituH
text.ud: तेन चास्मि वृता पूर्वमेष कामश्च मे पितुः
text.ur: tena cāsmi vr̥tā pūrvam eṣa kāmaś ca me pituḥ

text.ascii: mayA varayitavyo 'bhUc chAlvas tasmin svayaMvare
text.ur: mayā varayitavyo ’bhūc chālvas tasmin svayaṁvare

text.ascii: etad vijJAya dharmajJa tatas tvaM dharmam Acara
text.ur: etad vijñāya dharmajña tatas tvaṁ dharmam ācara

text.ascii: evam uktas tayA bhISmaH kanyayA viprasaMsadi
text.ur: evam uktas tayā bhīṣmaḥ kanyayā viprasaṁsadi

text.ascii: cintAm abhyagamad vIro yuktAM tasyaiva karmaNaH
text.ur: cintām abhyagamad vīro yuktāṁ tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ

text.ascii: sa vinizcitya dharmajJo brAhmaNair vedapAragaiH
text.ur: sa viniścitya dharmajño brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ

text.ascii: anujajJe tadA jyeSTAm ambAM kAzipateH sutAm
text.ur: anujajñe tadā jyeṣṭām ambāṁ kāśipateḥ sutām

text.ascii: ambikAmbAlike bhArye prAdAd bhrAtre yavIyase
text.ur: ambikāmbālike bhārye prādād bhrātre yavīyase

text.ascii: bhISmo vicitravIryAya vidhidRSTena karmaNA
text.ur: bhīṣmo vicitravīryāya vidhidr̥ṣṭena karmaṇā

text.ascii: tayoH pANiM gRhItvA sa rUpayauvanadarpitaH
text.ur: tayoḥ pāṇiṁ gr̥hītvā sa rūpayauvanadarpitaḥ

text.ascii: vicitravIryo dharmAtmA kAmAtmA samapadyata
text.ur: vicitravīryo dharmātmā kāmātmā samapadyata

text.ascii: te cApi bRhatI zyAme nIlakuJcitamUrdhaje
text.ur: te cāpi br̥hatī śyāme nīlakuñcitamūrdhaje

text.ascii: raktatuGganakhopete pInazroNipayodhare
text.ur: raktatuṅganakhopete pīnaśroṇipayodhare

text.ascii: AtmanaH pratirUpo 'sau labdhaH patir iti sthite
text.ur: ātmanaḥ pratirūpo ’sau labdhaḥ patir iti sthite

text.ascii: vicitravIryaM kalyANaM pUjayAm Asatus tu te
text.ur: vicitravīryaṁ kalyāṇaṁ pūjayām āsatus tu te

text.ascii: sa cAzvirUpasadRzo devasattvaparAkramaH
text.ur: sa cāśvirūpasadr̥śo devasattvaparākramaḥ

text.ascii: sarvAsAm eva nArINAM cittapramathano 'bhavat
text.ur: sarvāsām eva nārīṇāṁ cittapramathano ’bhavat

text.ascii: tAbhyAM saha samAH sapta viharan pRthivIpatiH
text.ur: tābhyāṁ saha samāḥ sapta viharan pr̥thivīpatiḥ

text.ascii: vicitravIryas taruNo yakSmANaM samapadyata
text.ur: vicitravīryas taruṇo yakṣmāṇaṁ samapadyata

text.ascii: suhRdAM yatamAnAnAm AptaiH saha cikitsakaiH
text.ur: suhr̥dāṁ yatamānānām āptaiḥ saha cikitsakaiḥ

text.ascii: jagAmAstam ivAdityaH kauravyo yamasAdanam
text.ur: jagāmāstam ivādityaḥ kauravyo yamasādanam

text.ascii: pretakAryANi sarvANi tasya samyag akArayat
text.ur: pretakāryāṇi sarvāṇi tasya samyag akārayat

text.ascii: rAjJo vicitravIryasya satyavatyA mate sthitaH
text.ur: rājño vicitravīryasya satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ

text.ascii: RtvigbhiH sahito bhISmaH sarvaiz ca kurupuMgavaiH
text.ur: r̥tvigbhiḥ sahito bhīṣmaḥ sarvaiś ca kurupuṁgavaiḥ
